mapper.select: select categories, explaination, name, goal, majorSeq, roadmap, roadmap_pic from major WHERE majorSeq=#{majorSeq}
select mp.mpseq, mp.majorSeq, mp.tel, mp.career, mp.subject, mp.title, mp.email, p.name, p.ppicture from major_professor mp, professor p WHERE mp.preginum = p.preginum and mp.majorSeq=#{majorSeq}
select mcSeq, majorSeq, grade, subject, explanation, credit from major_curriculum WHERE majorSeq=#{majorSeq} order by grade
select majorSeq, name, explaination from major WHERE categories=#{categories}

select address, applicantSeq, TO_CHAR(birthday,'dd/mm/yyyy'), email, indate, majorSeq, name, password, phoneNum, pic_name, procedding, requirement_file, wdate from applicant where phoneNum=#{phoneNum} and password=#{password}
select name from major where majorSeq=#{majorSeq}
